advanced_interpolate module¶

Original Developer: David Roberts Purpose of Module: To provide an implementation of the minimum jerk

implementation described in Polyakov.

Last Modified: 7/16/15 Last Modified By: Jonathan Ward Last Modification Purpose: To clarify naming and add citations. Citations:

“Analysis of Monkey Scribbles During Learning in the Framework of
Models of Planar Hand Motion”
